Blades of Exile Character Editor v2.0 alpha
Created 1997, Free Open Source

CREDITS:
Concept, Design, Programming: Jeff Vogel
Graphics: Andrew Hunter
Other Programming: Mariann Krizsan

The Blades of Exile Editor is created by Spiderweb Software -
"Where our aberrations become your reality."
"Blades of Exile" and Spiderweb Software are trademarks of Spiderweb Software.
Open Blades of Exile is maintained by volunteer open source developers.
Comments and questions? The maintainers of Open Blades of Exile want to hear them. Open a ticket here:
